## $plural variable

Get the plural by a number. The value is passed as a parameter to the translate function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
$plural: (value: number | string, prefix?: string, options?: Intl.PluralRulesOptions, ctx?: SpeakState, lang?: string) => string
```
